description: Detects dropped files with double extensions which is often used by malware as a method to abuse the fact that windows hide default extensions by default.
name: Suspicious Double Extension Files
query: (((file.path.text:(*.zip OR *.rar OR *.lnk OR *.iso OR *.exe) AND file.path.text:(*.doc.* OR *.docx.* OR *.xls.* OR *.xlsx.* OR *.ppt.* OR *.pptx.* OR *.jpg.*)) OR file.path.text:(*.zip.exe OR *.rar.exe)) AND (NOT (file.path.text:(*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Office\\Recent\\* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Recent\\*))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
frack113
